content: I completely agree with your suggestion. I think it's essential to have a broad understanding of machine learning concepts, as well as a deeper understanding of specific areas that are relevant to my role as a marketing specialist. Since I've already started taking online courses, I'll make sure to focus on building a strong foundation in machine learning concepts and then dive deeper into areas like NLP, recommendation systems, and predictive modeling. Do you think I should also consider getting certified in machine learning or data science to demonstrate my skills to potential employers or clients?
